template.name: Template - VMware Hypervisor
template.description:
Template para Hypervisors em ambiente VMware ESXi via API do vCenter
Modelo de Validacao: vCenter 6.5
Por: Vinicius Goncalves

item.name: Status - Overall
item.description: Gray: Unknown Green: OK Yellow: It might have a problem Red: It has a problem

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template - VMware Hypervisor/vmware.hv.datastore.multipath[{$VMWARE.URL},{$VMWARE.HV.UUID},{#DATASTORE}],#1)<>last(/Template - VMware Hypervisor/vmware.hv.datastore.multipath[{$VMWARE.URL},{$VMWARE.HV.UUID},{#DATASTORE}],#2) and last(/Template - VMware Hypervisor/vmware.hv.datastore.multipath[{$VMWARE.URL},{$VMWARE.HV.UUID},{#DATASTORE}])<{#MULTIPATH.COUNT}
trigger_prototype.name: O número de Datastore Paths foi alterado.

item_prototype.name: Datastore - {#DATASTORE}: Latência de Leitura do Datastore
Datastore - {#DATASTORE}: Latência de Escrita do Datastore
Status: Health State Rollup
item_prototype.description: Gray: Unknown Green: OK Yellow: It might heave a problem Red: It has a problem

item.name: CPU - Ready
item.description: Time that the virtual machine was ready, but could not get scheduled to run on the physical CPU during last measurement interval (VMware vCenter/ESXi Server performance counter sampling interval - 20 seconds)

trigger.name: System - VMware: A VM foi reiniciada.
